welcome.content:
# 🚀 Welcome to EasyDocs

EasyDocs helps you create beautiful, interactive documentation using simple markdown-like formatting. Build professional documentation sites with zero coding required.

---

## ✨ What can you do?

- 📝 **Format text** with headings, bold, italic, underline, and strikethrough
- 💻 **Add code blocks** with syntax highlighting and copy buttons
- 📋 **Create lists**, checkboxes, links, and responsive tables
- 🎨 **Show beautiful alerts** for info, warning, danger, and success states
- 📚 **Use modules** to organize your docs into pages and sections
- 🌍 **Deploy globally** with Cloudflare Pages integration

---

## 🎯 Formatting Examples

### **Text Styling:**
**Bold text** | *Italic text* | __Underlined text__ | ~~Strikethrough text~~

### **Code Examples:**
`inline code` with syntax highlighting

```javascript
// JavaScript code block with syntax highlighting
const welcome = () => {
  console.log('Welcome to EasyDocs! 🎉');
  return 'Beautiful documentation made easy';
};
```

```bash
# Terminal commands
npm install easydocs
npm run dev
```

### **Interactive Elements:**

**Blockquotes:**
> 💡 **Pro Tip:** EasyDocs automatically generates a responsive sidebar navigation from your content structure.

**Task Lists:**
- [x] ✅ Set up EasyDocs project
- [x] ✅ Configure language files
- [ ] 📝 Add your custom content
- [ ] 🚀 Deploy to production

**Links & Navigation:**
[📖 View Documentation](/) | [💻 GitHub Repository](https://github.com/MILKv2/easydocs) | [🚀 Live Demo](/)

---

### **Alert Components:**

:::info 📘 **Information**
This is an informational alert. Perfect for tips, notes, and helpful information.
:::

:::warning ⚠️ **Warning**
This is a warning alert. Use it to highlight important considerations or potential issues.
:::

:::danger 🚨 **Danger**
This is a danger alert. Use it for critical information that users must pay attention to.
:::

:::success ✅ **Success**
This is a success alert. Great for confirmations, completed tasks, and positive feedback.
:::

---

### **Data Tables:**

| Feature | Description | Status |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| 🎨 **Theming** | Light/Dark mode support | ✅ Available |
| 📱 **Responsive** | Mobile-first design | ✅ Available |
| 🔍 **Search** | Full-text search capability | 🚧 Coming Soon™️ |
| 🌐 **Languages** | Multi-language support | ✅ Available |
| 📊 **Images** | Full image support with responsive design | ⚠️ BETA |

---

## 🛠️ How to Create Content

### **Step 1: Understanding Modules**
Each page or section is a **module** defined in your language JSON file. The structure is simple and intuitive:

```json
{
  "test1": {
    "title": "test title",
    "pages": {
      "5": {
        "title": "test name",
        "description": "test.",
        "content": "test."
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### **Step 2: Adding New Pages**
1. 📝 Open your language JSON file (e.g., `en.json` or `pl.json`)
2. ➕ Add new modules under the `content` section
3. 🎨 Use any formatting elements shown above
4. 💾 Save and your changes appear instantly!

### **Step 3: Organizing Content**
- Use **nested structures** for complex documentation
- Create **page hierarchies** with numbered sections
- Add **descriptions** to help users navigate
- Include **rich formatting** to make content engaging

---

## 🚀 Quick Start

**Ready to dive in?** Here's what you can do next:

1. 🔍 **Explore the sidebar** → Browse through existing documentation sections
2. 📝 **Edit content** → Modify the JSON files to add your own content
3. 🎨 **Customize styling** → Use the theme toggle to switch between light/dark modes
4. 🌐 **Add languages** → Create additional language files for internationalization
5. 🚀 **Deploy** → Push to GitHub and deploy with Cloudflare Pages

---

**Need help?** Check out the [📖 Configuration Guide](/#1) or [🛠️ Installation Guide](/#2) to get started!

*Happy documenting! 🎉*

1.description: Learn how to configure EasyDocs, customize language files, add new pages, and set up advanced features for your documentation platform.
1.content:
# ⚙️ Configuration Guide

Learn how to add content and customize your documentation using simple formatting options.

---

## 💻 Adding Your Content

### **How to Create New Pages:**

1. **Open your language file** (e.g., `src/lang/en.json`)
- To create a new language go to `/src/hooks/useLanguage.ts` and do the following:
```Typescript
const AVAILABLE_LANGUAGES = [
    { code: 'en', name: 'English', flag: '🇺🇸' },
    { code: 'pl', name: 'Polish', flag: '🇵🇱' },
    // Add more languages here
].map(lang => ({
    ...lang,
    code: lang.code.toLowerCase(),
    name: lang.name,
    flag: lang.flag
}))
```
2. **Find the `content` section**
3. **Add a new page:**

```json
"content": {
  "my_new_page": {
    "title": "My New Page",
    "description": "A brief description of what this page covers",
    "content": "# Welcome\n\nYour content goes here..."
  }
}
```

### **Adding Multiple Pages:**

For sections with multiple pages:

```json
"my_section": {
  "title": "My Section Title",
  "pages": {
    "1": {
      "title": "Introduction",
      "description": "Getting started with...",
      "content": "# Introduction\n\nContent here..."
    },
    "2": {
      "title": "Advanced Topics",
      "description": "Deep dive into...",
      "content": "# Advanced\n\nMore content..."
    }
  }
}
```

---

## 📝 Complete Formatting Reference

### **🔤 Text Formatting**

| Type It | You Get | Use For |
|---------|---------|----------|
| `# Heading 1` | # Large Title | Main page titles |
| `## Heading 2` | ## Section Title | Major sections |
| `### Heading 3` | ### Subsection | Subsections |
| `#### Heading 4` | #### Minor Heading | Details |
| `**bold text**` | **bold text** | Emphasis |
| `*italic text*` | *italic text* | Light emphasis |
| `__underlined text__` | __underlined text__ | Special terms |
| `~~strikethrough~~` | ~~strikethrough~~ | Deprecated content |

### **💻 Code Examples**

**Inline Code:**
- Type:  `your code here` 
- Use for: Commands, variables, short snippets

**Code Blocks:**
```javascript
const example = {
  name: "My Project",
  version: "1.0.0"
};
```

### **📋 Lists & Organization**

**Bullet Lists:**
```
- First item
- Second item
- Third item
```

**Numbered Lists:**
```
1. Step one
2. Step two
3. Step three
```

**Task Lists:**
```
- [x] Completed task ✅
- [ ] Pending task ⏳
- [ ] Future task 📅
```

### **🎨 Visual Elements**

**Blockquotes:**
```
> 💡 **Pro Tip:** This is important information
> that stands out from regular text.
```

**Horizontal Lines:**
```
---
```

**Links:**
```
[Link Text](https://example.com)
[Internal Link](/#section)
```

**Images:**
```
![Alt Text](image_path_or_url)
![Demo GIF](https://example.com/demo.gif)
![Local Image](/public/images/screenshot.png)
```

![Link img](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1302067272881279017/1389488196546592778/watermark.gif?ex=687a8df9&is=68793c79&hm=66e57ed7aa0c86df8b6098f30a46002b8aca9721bb2691af1577aef9f0717538&=)

![Local img](/public/images/togif.gif)

### **🚨 Alert Boxes**

```
:::info 📘 **Information**
This is an informational alert for tips and notes.
:::

:::warning ⚠️ **Warning**
This is a warning alert for important considerations.
:::

:::danger 🚨 **Danger**
This is a danger alert for critical information.
:::

:::success ✅ **Success**
This is a success alert for confirmations.
:::
```

### **📊 Tables**

```
| Feature | Status | Description |
|---------|--------|--------------|
| Feature 1 | ✅ Ready | Fully working |
| Feature 2 | 🚧 WIP | In progress |
| Feature 3 | 📅 Planned | Coming soon |
```

2.title: Installation Guide
2.description: How to clone the repository and deploy to hosting platforms
2.content:
# 🚀 Installation Guide

## 📥 Clone Repository

```bash
git clone https://github.com/MILKv2/easydocs.git
cd easydocs
npm install
npm run build
```

## 🌐 Deploy to Pages

### **Cloudflare Pages:**
1. Install wrangler (if not installed)
```bash
npm install -g wrangler
```
2. Login to Cloudflare
```bash
wrangler login
```
3. Publish your site
```bash
npm run deploy
```
